text: Brian "Licorice" Locking (22 December 1938 â€“ 8 October 2020) was an English rock pianist and songwriter. He was the bass guitarist with The Shadows between 1962 and 1963. During his time with the band he appeared with Sir Cliff Richard in the movie Summer Holiday. Locking was born in Bedworth, Warwickshire.
